name: SBM Project (WIP)
description:
A casual game concept I tested on a private 36-hours gamejam.

Later on I plan on experimenting some visual and rhythmic ideas, and maybe port it to mobile.

Amazing soundtrack by:
Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Your Call" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)

Audio file can be found at: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5018-your-call/
